title: Judaism and the belief in a covenant

content.question: Judaism is based on the belief in

choices.label: a covenant between God and the Hebrew people
nature as a life force in an orderly and just universe
faith alone with few rituals or rules of behavior
a rejection of this world and its cares

content.answer: a covenant between God and the Hebrew people
